item.title: Feeling smug. Just threw caution to the wind and trimmed my beard freestyle - no guard, no plan, just clippers, a steady hand and a touch of steely self-confidence. And I don't look like I've lost a fight with a lawnmower. Result!
item.dc:creator: @humbert15
item.description: Feeling smug. Just threw caution to the wind and trimmed my beard freestyle - no guard, no plan, just clippers, a steady hand and a touch of steely self-confidence. And I don't look like I've lost a fight with a lawnmower. Result!

item.title: R to @stephenkb: For me it was a rugby ball, which I attempted to kick back to 20 or so expectant teenagers. Not only did the ball fail to clear the fence between us, but I also wrecked my ankle so couldn't try again, nor could I walk away without hobbling & whimpering. The shame still lingers.
item.dc:creator: @humbert15
item.description: For me it was a rugby ball, which I attempted to kick back to 20 or so expectant teenagers. Not only did the ball fail to clear the fence between us, but I also wrecked my ankle so couldn't try again, nor could I walk away without hobbling & whimpering. The shame still lingers.
